name: Vegetables vs Meat
description:
Isn't a finished game but, I hope it is understandable and playable. :)

It is a puzzle-platformer game, build a path for the rabbit and help the cat get what he wants.

The cat activates an interrupter that saves us from someone who is eating too much meat.

I'm vegetarian but, almost it is true.

v 0.0.2

- Minor fixes in 'build bridges' mechanic.

- Minor fixes in 'take fruit preference' mechanic
